titles.title: Adjusting the amount provided for the expenses of certain committees of the House of Representatives in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.
Adjusting the amount provided for the expenses of certain committees of the House of Representatives in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported by the Committee on House Administration. H. Rept. 117-291.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 74.

vote.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1065, H. Res. 1035 is considered passed House.

term.name: House Committee on Education and Labor
House Committee on Energy and Commerce
House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
House Committee on Ways and Means
House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence

bill.summary: This resolution adjusts limitations on expenses for the 1st and 2nd sessions of the 117th Congress (including staff salaries) for the following House Committees: (1) Agriculture; (2) Armed Services; (3) the Budget; (4) Select Committee on the Climate Crisis; (5) Education and Labor; (6) Energy and Commerce; (7) Ethics; (8) Financial Services; (9) Foreign Affairs; (10) Homeland Security; (11) House Administration; (12) Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence; (13) Judiciary; (14) Select Committee on the Modernization of Congress; (15) Natural Resources; (16) Oversight and Reform; (17) Rules; (18) Science, Space, and Technology; (19) Small Business; (20) Transportation and Infrastructure; (21) Veterans' Affairs; and (22) Ways and Means.
